sect2.title: Introduction to db-&db-3.1-version;
sect2.para: The db-&db-3.1-version; package contains version &db-3.1-version; of the Berkeley database. Evolution needs exactly this version and not any other, the details on "why" are in the README file distibuted with the evolution source code. Evolution links to the library statically, hence this book installs the db-&db-3.1-version; in /opt, which can be removed once Evolution is compiled.
